title: Gloria Vanderbilt Women's Shape Effect Pull on High Rise Flare Jean Standard
description: STYLE - Comfort waist pull on jean sits at natural waistline providing the coverage and flexability you want in a flare leg body.
VERSATILITY - Pairs great with all tops from shirts and blouses to novelty tees and all footwear from stylish heels to your favorite flats!
LENGTH - This high waist bell bottom pant comes in 2 lengths; 32 inch regular/average length and 30 inch short length with a 21 inch leg opening
Effortlessly fun and stylish Gloria Vanderbilt is a versatile yet classic look that attracts and connects with the modern sensibility of consumers of all ages.

Gloria Vanderbilt Women's Apparel; Shape effect comfort waist pull on flare jean gives you that cover confidence we all want whether your top is tucked in or not. The high rise waist sits at natural waistline with a comfortable elastic waistband and fully functional back pockets so you can run around with or without a handbag. This bell bottom leg jean will go great with all your tops from fashion forward to a basic tee shirt as well as all footwear from strappy sandals and trendy heels to your favorite flats or boots. the perfect year round bottom available in assorted washes, see color name for specifics. - Goria Vanderbilt, Effortlessly fun and stylish. A versatile yet classic look that attracts and connects with the modern sensibility of consumers of all ages.
